title: Scattered By Conflict, Syrians Flee To Europe
teaser: More than 200,000 Syrians have made their way to Europe on crowded ships and forged documents. NPR's Scott Simon talks to Joanna Kakissis, who has spent months tracking families on their journeys.
contentencoded:
More than 200,000 Syrians have made their way on crowded ships and forged documents to Europe. NPR's Scott Simon talks to Joanna Kakissis, who has spent months tracking families on their journeys.
